Layer.EnabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'dance' then self:diffuse(ColorRGB(-1)) else self:diffuse(.16,.24,.27,1) end end)
Layer.DisabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'dance' then self:diffuse(.24,.31,.35,1) else self:diffuse(.12,.2,.23,1) end end)

Layer.EnabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'pump' then self:diffuse(ColorRGB(-1)) else self:diffuse(.16,.24,.27,1) end end)
Layer.DisabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'pump' then self:diffuse(.24,.31,.35,1) else self:diffuse(.12,.2,.23,1) end end)

Layer.EnabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'dance' then self:diffuse(ColorRGB(1)) else self:diffuse(.16,.24,.27,1) end end)
Layer.DisabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'dance' then self:diffuse(.24,.31,.35,1) else self:diffuse(.12,.2,.23,1) end end)

Layer.EnabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'pump' then self:diffuse(ColorRGB(1)) else self:diffuse(.16,.24,.27,1) end end)
Layer.DisabledCommand: %SIMPLY_LOVE(function(self) if game == 'pump' then self:diffuse(.24,.31,.35,1) else self:diffuse(.12,.2,.23,1) end end)
